name: FunAnimalFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Animal Facts”
”Alexa, start Animal Facts”
”Alexa, launch Animal Facts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal facts
des:
Animal Facts is a skill to help you learn a random fact about animals. Alexa might even throw in a small quip!

You can say:

"Alexa, open Animal Facts"
"Alexa, start Animal Facts"
"Alexa, launch Animal Facts"
